message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $17000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I'm not comfortable with $17000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $19000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18500?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $19250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $19250. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18750?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price. I can offer it to you for $19500. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $19500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18750?

I'm starting to feel like we're stuck, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, just like you suggested. I can offer it to you for $19375. This is my last concession, so I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18500?

I'm starting to feel like we're going around in circles, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $19000. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to consider other options.
